location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:70 x 95 mmCondition:The image is in good condition.Foliation:'b'; '16'Process:Silver gelatin print

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject Matter:View across the harbour at Linga [Lingeh]. A lone figure is crouched at centre with a bag or basket. Linga stretches from left to right in the background. At least one wind tower (badghir) is visible.Inscriptions:Lower left, below image, in pen: ‘Linga’Upper left, above image, in pencil, crossed-out: ‘b’Lower right, alongside image, in pencil: ‘16’Lower right, below image, in pen: ‘(Jan. 1918)’
